Title: Requires schools to provide instruction on the history of the Ukrainian genocide-holodomor of 1932 through 1933
Summary: Requires schools to provide instruction on the history of the Ukrainian Genocide-Holodomor of 1932 to 1933.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to instruction on the subject of the history of the Ukrainian Genocide-Holodomor of 1932 to 1933
